data.text: Waaku'mbu'ki'ye bandu panga bapalikwa kwaisimu na kwayu'wa alongosi babaatawala. Mwibi'ke wiso kwa kila lyengo linogau.
Waabakiye kanebantukane mundu ywoywoti, kanebayu'mane, ila babe anogau na atu'lya kwa bandu boti.

Kwa mwanjaa twenga twabene nsimu nsi'si' twaabile twaalalo, twakingayu'wa, twaatikongelwa, na twaatabilwe na maminyikio ga kila sampuli. Twaatami muulau na bwigu, twaatisukilwa na twenga ngatusukwana twabene na bene.
Lakini unogau na upendo wa Nnu'ngu', Nkosopoli witu pawaumukulilwe,
aatukosopoli lili kwo pi'tya makowe gitu ga aki gatupangite, ila kwa kiya sake. Aatukosopoli kwa kutupeletea kwo belekwa kai' na kutupanga twayambi' kwa ndi'la ya Loo Mpeleteu.
Nnu'ngu' atuulukiye Loo wake pangali li'ngi'lya kwo pi'tya Yesu Kilisitu Nkosopoli witu,
li'nga tubalangilwe aki kwa ngu'ngu' yake, tupate panga twaalisi ku'no katuu'bi'lya tubile na ukoto wangayomoka.
Mayi'gi'yo gano ga kakape. Nikupala wenga ugakong'ondeli makowe ga, li'nga boti babamwu'bi'lya Nnu'ngu' babe na kilu'lu' so panga makowe manogau. Mayi'gi'yo go manogau kai' gakumpwaika kila mundu.
Lakini utame kuutalu na nnomo au mataukyano ga kilogeloge bu'kana na salya au ngolo. Ago goti gapwaikali, kai', gabule bai.
Mundu ywayu'mania bandu, unkwi'li'ke mala yimo au ata mala ibi'li', mana aakana kukuyu'wa ulekane nakwe mpamo.
Utangite panga mundu kati ywo aulei ukakape, na sambi yake impwatya mwene.
Nibini yenda tama kukilambo sa Nikapoli kwa wu'no nsimu woti wa mbepo, lakini naalu'a kuntuma Atema au Tikiko kasako, mana aikite akwo wenga waabini isa Nikapoli li'nga tukwembane.
Ukondamie kunnyangatia Zena yu'lu' mundu wa salya, na Apolo. Waapei ili'be yoti yaipalikwa mumwanja wabe.
Ayi' nga ndi'la yaipalikwa bandu bitu baiyi'gane panga makowe manogau, li'nga kwayangatiya apaali mumakowe go imukya. Kwo panga nyo, maisa gabe gaapangali gabule.
Bandu boti bababile nanenga pano bendakusalimia. Tumbwelelo, na wenga kai' wasalimie aumini boti babatupenda muimani.
